name: Instant Weather
shortDescription: An Android weather application implemented using the MVVM pattern, Retrofit2, Dagger2, LiveData, ViewModel, Coroutines, Room, Navigation Components, Data Binding and some other libraries from the Android Jetpack.
longDescription: An Android weather application implemented using the MVVM pattern, Retrofit2, Dagger2, LiveData, ViewModel, Coroutines, Room, Navigation Components, Data Binding and some other libraries from the Android Jetpack.
